mahawanshayata [parichchedaya 23, pataya 45-48] anuwa mahasona yodhaya, kulumbari pradeshaye hundariwapi gramaye thissa namaththata dawa atawani puthu lesa upatha laba atha. ekala sona lesa handinwunu dasa wiyathi koluwa, ‘wisal thal-gas’ mulinudura damimata tharam shakthimath wu bawath, pasuwa athun dasa denekuge shakthiya daru bawada kiyawe.

mema katha puwatha mawu alkatras siragedara dan mahajanaya sadaha wiwrutha sancharaka purayaki. 1963 di siragedara wasa damuwath baladharin sancharakayanta balaganima sadaha bandhanagara sankirnaya nawikaranaya nokota ee aakarayatama thabagathha. 1962 siddhiyata sambandha siramadiri ha upakarana ee aakarayenma daka balaganimata dan des wides sancharakayanta pahasukam salasa atha.
